overview: Feeling patriotic? Barely Legal #4 celebrates our nation's sexual diversity serving up five slices of juicy, 18-year-old American pie. Savor more than a dozen beautiful girls from the shores of the Big Island to the gritty streets of New York City. In Hawaiian Rose, and exotic innocent bids aloha to her virginity and lures two surfers to her secret wet spot. Sleazy sisters live the American dream and become erotic entrepreneurs in Cheat at Any Price.
tagline: 18 and Ready Squeaky-Clean Teens Crave X-rated Fun
title: Barely Legal 4
